projects.title: Tongs
projects.summary: Tongs is an application that lets you search for a YouTube Video (or Audio) and play it while the Audio (or Video) of a different YouTube Video is played. Users are able to upvote and downvote mashups. Scores are saved in Firebase to store trending and popular mashups.

projects.title: Activities
projects.summary: This application allows users to find activites to do and can even build own activiites to host and let other people join.

projects.title: Home.ie
projects.summary: This application allows users to better maintain a clean and happy living enviroment with other housemates/roomates
